what i do

I am part of an exceptional team at DeadHappy that is dedicated to changing attitudes towards death. I work closely with insurance partners, underwriters, and technology teams to drive product innovation that makes traditional protection products more accessible, affordable, and flexible for our customers.

why i do it

My passion lies in creating exceptional products that exceed end-usersâ€™ expectations while achieving business objectives. I am equally intrigued by team dynamics and strive to create cohesive, committed teams that deliver outstanding results. Above all, I am motivated to collaborate with inspiring individuals and pursue excellence in everything I do.

what I've done

Over the course of my career, I have honed a diverse skill set that has equipped me to engage with stakeholders at all levels of an organisation to identify opportunities for growth and efficiency. Working closely alongside both engineering and executive teams, I have successfully developed and delivered a range of new products and initiatives, including those that simplify complex and heavily regulated products into intuitive, user-friendly services for customers to easily access.

In addition to my core product and project management expertise, I have also facilitated workshops, team building events, strategy sessions, and have led Labs teams in utilising a lean, build-measure-learn approach to test and validate unproven solutions, driving innovation across multiple product areas.

where i've worked

  • DeadHappy, Head of Product, 2020 - present
  • Profile Pensions, Head of Product, 2017 - 2020
  • Comparethemarket.com, Senior Project / Product / Portfolio Manager, 2013 - 2017
  • Shazam, Technical Project Manager, 2012 - 2013
  • BBC, Software Engineer / Technical Project / Product Manager, 2010 - 2012
  • DDB London, Designer / Software Developer, 2000 - 2009

what I like

Family. Good friends, good books, good food, fine wine, country walks, gentle runs, inspiring views, interesting conversation. Just a few of my favourite things.
